channel.title: What are you guys thoughts?
channel.description:
Lostprophets' frontman Ian Watkins was jailed for alleged child sex crimes almost a year ago. Despite previously saying he "furiously denies" the charges and asserting today that "he was a victim of a malicious campaign", Watkins pleaded guilty to the following: sexual assault involving children (3 counts) child pornography (six counts) animal pornography (one count)
http://www.97xonline.com/weblogs/new-music-blog/2013/nov/26/lostprophets-singer-pleads-guilty-child-sex-charge/ I didn't know this band at all until reading this, but I still think its ridiculous what people will do for people who are "famous".

item.title: What are you guys thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4UZLJ_bAmaI

this was my shit back in the day, also apparently the dude tried to pay some women to let him rape her baby. all around fucked up dude
